title: Can I draw facial features on non living things like making animated fruits, pens etc? Assimalhakeem
transcript: i draw animated fruits so i have a pen i draw a pen and i put eyes and a nose and a mouth or a jalapeno on a stick is that okay well this is not a living creature however you are making something similar to allah's creation which makes it haram you can make an animated pen or a an orange or a mango without putting any facial features to it and this would make it insha allah permissible
